page.title: Chistmas Mod Text
page.t: Greetings, pilot. Are you here about the job?
An individual, calling themselves Santa Claus, is giving away toys! This is cutting into our profits and must be dealt with.
We need you to handle this problem by taking out this Santa Claus. We have received reports of several bodyguards but nothing you shouldn't be able to handle.
Wonderful! This will be a most profitable endeavor.
That's a pity, let us know if you change your mind.
We await the results of your mission.
Santa Claus is giving away toys for free! The profits of many Teladi are being hurt, so the issue must be dealt with. Find Santa Claus and end this madness.
